original_title: 聖ミカエラ学園漂流記-実写版-
overview: The definitive version of the popular sailor suit drama is now available in live action! Starring Megumi Ichinose, who is a hot topic in photo books. St. Michaela Academy says that if you graduate, you will be on the stage of Takarazuka ...
title: St. Michael Academy: Hyoryu-ki
